column4: Hi. i'm noob. i just installed ubuntu and want to update it and install some apps on it. ubuntu software center says " Waiting for Jockey-backend to exit". what should i do ?
Hi. i'm noob. i just installed ubuntu and want to update it and install some apps on it. ubuntu software center says " Waiting for Jockey-backend to exit". what should i do ?
Should i keep using the 12.04 beta or use 10.04 or 11.10 ?
there is still *only" beta version of ubuntu 12.04
